name: Into Oblivion
description: Into Oblivion is a drinking contest of ridiculous proportion. Mix drinks against a variety of bots or drink your friends, and strangers, under the table in three different multiplayer modes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD or Intel Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+ Sound Card: Only if you want sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: AMD or Intel Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+ Network: Broadband Internet connection Sound Card: Only if you want sound
